summary: Darken book pages to make them less blinding to read.  Custom textures at double resolution.
descriptionHtml:
==============================================
Unblinding Books By VaiN
==============================================

==============================================
DESCRIPTION:
===============================================
If you are like me and play the game in the dark then you may have noticed how blinding it can be when viewing books. This is a simple mod that darkens book pages to make them less blinding.

==============================================
UPDATES:
===============================================
V3:
Increased texture resolution to 1024x1024 (double)
Custom Book Page texture
added more detail to notes and letters
normal maps baked in Blender
darkened similar to V2

Note: have not had a chance to fully test all of them
let me know if there are any issues

V2:
recreated to be less dark than V1, and also with less contrast

===============================================
INSTALLATION:
===============================================
Easy Install/Uninstall:
Use Nexus Mod Manager

Manual Install:
Copy the included textures folder to the Skyrim\\Data directory

Manual Uninstall:
Delete the files listed below


===============================================
FILES AND PATHS:
===============================================
\\Data\\Textures\\clutter\\books\\largebookpaper01.dds
\\Data\\Textures\\clutter\\books\\largebookpaper01_n.dds
\\Data\\Textures\\clutter\\books\\largenote01.dds
\\Data\\Textures\\clutter\\books\\largenote01_n.dds
\\Data\\Textures\\clutter\\books\\largenote01blood.dds
\\Data\\Textures\\clutter\\books\\largenote01blood_n.dds
\\Data\\Textures\\clutter\\books\\largenote02.dds
\\Data\\Textures\\clutter\\books\\largenote02_n.dds
\\Data\\Textures\\clutter\\books\\largenote03.dds
\\Data\\Textures\\clutter\\books\\largenote03_n.dds
\\Data\\Textures\\clutter\\books\\largenote04.dds
\\Data\\Textures\\clutter\\books\\largetornpage.dds
\\Data\\Textures\\clutter\\books\\largetornpage_n.dds


===============================================
CREDITS & USAGE:
===============================================
Feel free to include this mod with other mods, but please give credit.


===============================================
CONTACT INFO
===============================================
NAME: VaiN
EMAIL: vain474[at]gmail[dot]com
NEXUS: vain474
